verbose_text: The thiazolidinediones (TZDs), a class of potent agonists of peroxisome proliferator activated receptor-gamma (PPARgamma), increasing the activation of this transcription factor in adipose tissue, restores lipogenic function and decrease inflammation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PPARgamma), increasing the activation of this transcription factor in adipose tissue, restores lipogenic function and decrease inflammation
